snippet: England striker Jermain Defoe began his long goodbye from Tottenham Hotspur with his first Premier League goal of the season as the home side recovered from a poor first half to beat Crystal Palace 2-0 on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Defoe Begins Long Goodbye From Spurs With Typical Goal
headline.main: Defoe Begins Long Goodbye From Spurs With Typical Goal

lead_paragraph: England striker Jermain Defoe began his long goodbye from Tottenham Hotspur with his first Premier League goal of the season as the home side recovered from a poor first half to beat Crystal Palace 2-0 on Saturday.
